item.title: dgplug Homework
item.description: I joined dgplug foss summer training, few days back as I was quite fascinated with the concept of FOSS and Open Source in general. It is always my dream, to have my patch accepted in some FOSS project and watch it get used in daily life by others. It has been an amazing experince overall. There is a lot to learn in this world. I believe I have started taking small steps towards learning new stuff in this process.
